title: Escape to Ponderosa (1960) Bonanza Classic TV Western

sources.title: Escape to Ponderosa (1960) Bonanza Classic TV Western
sources.description:
Ben starts to have second thoughts about helping a brutal stockade commander track down three prisoners on the lam when he realizes what they had to deal with. Joe Maross, Gloria Talbott, and Grant Williams guest star.
 
Director: Charles F. Haas
Writers: Robert E. Thompson, Bill Barrett 
Stars: Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker
Genres: Bonanza, Classics, Cult, TV, Western
